description: Chris Harder is at it again, this time in a jewelry shop preying on Jimmy Fanz. Jimmy is looking to buy his coldhearted, bitch of a wife some accessories to get back in her good graces. As it turns out, jewelry doesn’t always cut it these days. Jimmy doesn’t get down on himself though. Instead he whips out his cock and fucks Chris’ willing, hungry hole. Jimmy doesn’t stop there as he knows how to make the best of any situation. He goes on his back, spreads his legs, and invites Chris’ eager dick to pound his horny ass.
title: Home Wrecker Part 3
